|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64VSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Realtek;RTL8197FS;onchip; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB;RTL8367RB, H7P39E3, GH31B TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691H;701, 691H, 749;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;xxx;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/13/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00ES6ZQ7O |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = 8.6 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches |weight = 12.3 ounces |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, H51CTP1 GH23; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "V1.1" and "10033208" is silkscreened on the top of the board in the FCC photos. * Web GUI: http://tendawifi.com According to the User Manual, only the [[Tenda AC10U]] model has a USB port. :The Product Similarity Declaration document says, :*"The model of AC10U's Power is 12Vdc 1.5A, with a USB port and circuit. :*The model of AC10's Power is 12Vdc 1A, without a USB port and circuit. :The difference of two models just are adapter power, USB port and circuit. The rest are same. :The difference between the two models has no effect on the power of prototype." ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tenda-ac10-review-wireless-router-full-contrasts ''Tenda AC10'' Review on '''Digital Citizen'''] (EN) *[http://www.acwifi.net/5439.html ''Tenda AC10'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/SAM_3448.jpg PCB images]) *[https://www.imidoresc.ro/2017/10/27/tenda-ac10-review-router-ac-de-apartament-cu-performante-chiar-ok/ ''Tenda AC10'' Review on '''Imidoresc'''] (RO) :Specifications from the review: :*Number of Antennas/Removable: 4/No :*Ports: 1x WAN / 3x LAN (GbE) :*Size: 8.6 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches or 220 x 141.5 x 49 mm :*Weight: 12.3 ounces or 350 grams ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Serial • >> •. |
====Settings for serial access====
* Bits per second/Baud rate = 115200
* Data Bits = 8
* Parity = none
* Stop bits = 1
* Flow control = none

====Bootloader commands====
?
----------------- COMMAND MODE HELP ------------------
HELP (?)                 : Print this help message
DB 
 
DW 
 
EB 
  ...
EW 
  ...
CMP: CMP 
IPCONFIG:
MEMCPY:
AUTOBURN: 0/1
LOADADDR: 
J: Jump to 
reboot
FLI: Flash init
FLR: FLR 
FLW 
 : Write to SPI
MDIOR:  MDIOR phyid reg
MDIOW:  MDIOW phyid reg data
PHYR: PHYR 
PHYW: PHYW 
PHYPR: PHYPR 
PHYPW: PHYPW 
COUNTER: Dump Asic Counter
XMOD   [jump]
TI : timer init
T : test
ETH : startup Ethernet
CPUClk:
CP0
ERASECHIP
ERASESECTOR
SPICLB () : SPI Flash Calibration
D8 

E8
}} ====Serial Recovery==== =====Unbrick procedure===== * Connect router to PC via serial (CH340, PL2303, etc.) :If you don't know '''GND''', '''RX''', '''TX''' see below image. '''YOU DON'T NEED VCC!!!''' * Before power up, press '''RST/WPS''' button and hold it, then connect the power. :You should hold '''RST/WPS''' for about 15 secs since you connected the power, :in order to enter "disaster mode". * Connect cable between ''WAN1'' port and your computer network card. :For that connection set IP '''192.168.1.100''', subnet mask '''255.255.255.0''' :- you don't need to fill out gateway. * Download '''Tftpd32/Tftpd64''' from here: [http://tftpd32.jounin.net/tftpd32_download.html tftpd32 download] :(In my case I've used the portable version of Tftpd64 - v4.62) * Open '''Tftpd32/Tftpd64'''; '''Server interfaces''' → select your connection, :the one with IP '''192.168.1.100'''. * Select '''Tftp Client''' tab; '''Host''': ''192.168.1.6'', '''Port''': ''69'', '''Local file''': : *SELECT YOUR FIRMWARE*, '''Remote file''': *LEAVE EMPTY*, :'''Block Size''': ''Default'' and press "'''Put'''". ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Tendaac10serial.jpg|Serial
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== *[[Tenda AC6]] • [[Tenda AC9]] *[[Tenda AC15]] • [[Tenda AC18]] *[[Tenda Nova MW6 (Mesh3)]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
